name: ChUwUing Gum
description:
Play as a cute little chewing-gum who got tired of not being thrown away in the garbage can, and therefore goes on a rampage of annoying humanity into becoming more ecologist. 

 The chewing-gum can be either wet or dry, thus changing the characteristic of its abilities allowing it to do different things and access different areas.
This project was made by five Game designer during their 3rd year at Isart Digital. This project is only a 3C Project and it is not a full game.

Credits:
